nodes.text: The Kossak-class Frigate was a frigate manufactured by Ubrikkian Industries.

Kossak-class frigates were armed with a dozen turbolaser batteries, a dozen twin light laser cannons, four twin medium ion cannons, and a pair of heavy tractor beam emitters. It was well equipped with both armor and shielding. It also carried a small hangar bay which supported a dozen starfighters and three shuttles.
It was designed specifically for the Hutts, and was widely used to defend Hutt interests against pirates or rivals.
